name: Raga Yaman
description: A serene evening raga that evokes peace and tranquility.
arohana: N R G M D N S
avarohana: S N D P M G R S

name: Raga Bhairavi
description: A morning raga often associated with devotion and longing.
arohana: S r g m P d n S
avarohana: S n d P m g r S

name: Raga Bhupali
description: A pentatonic raga that brings a sense of stability and joy.
arohana: S R G P D S
avarohana: S D P G R S

name: Raga Darbari
description: A grave and majestic raga that helps settle the mind.
arohana: S R g m P d n S
avarohana: S n d P m g R S
